archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: MS: BAL Interface
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Interface to the Horizon system via the Horizon BAL in order to make use of BAL services. At the current release, the available services are.
Responsible for: logging into and out of the BAL, and extraction of necessary control values e.g. last used SSN, JSN etc formatting settlement messages to be passed to the BAL (accounting lines etc) passing of settlement messages to BAL and handling of responses formatting and passing of any third-party calls that may be required to be passed by the BAL
